title: Champion rubberband with good fps and low ping

embed.description: shen lag in game, using this footage for forums

body: yes, this is what you see, this is really what i experienced in game, a little help and feedback would be appreciated, thanks

replies.body:
Yeeeaaa this doesn't look so much like an issue with your fps, but rather this is a pretty strong case of packet loss from the looks of that video. Packet loss happens when your ISP is routing your connection is an awkward way or through a damaged node, so most of the time there's not a whole lot that can be done if that ISP is currently having issues. 

Let's be sure of what we're dealing with first though. Grab the network logs from that game and let this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) analyze it. Afterwards, snap a screenshot and post it here so I can go over it with you.

See if capping your FPS at 144 helps with the issue.

Sometimes when the FPS is uncapped and it's really high you can experience some sort of de-sync.

I'll give it a shot. I'll get back to you when I get home and am able to play

UPDATE: It's not working
keep in mind, this isn't recording lag, this is what i experienced and what you are seeing is what i saw in game{{champion:98}}
